reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our arrival in Mallaig was fraught with poor timing. We missed our train to Mallaig because we misread the schedule. We consequently missed our ferry to the Isle of Skye and needed to spend an evening in Mallaig. Alright, so we booked ourselves a B&B as we waited for our train in Glasgow, and arrived in Mallaig, and walked to our B&B, only to be kicked out because the landlady had become ill and not written our reservation down, then given it to someone else.
reviews.title: I loved the Shalimar and its proprietor, Ben!
